alert.note: Alert for Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Travis County through 700 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pflugerville, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Austin, Round Rock, Pflugerville, Tanglewood Forest, Windemere, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Manor, West Lake Hills, Rollingwood, Mustang Ridge, Barton Creek, Onion Creek, Shady Hollow, Hornsby Bend, Sunset Valley, Garfield, Maha, Wells Branch, Del Valle and Pilot Knob. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
